CustomField.formula: CASE(Market_Unit__c, 'DFJ_DK', ((Capacity__c*0.45)*$CustomMetadata.Currency_Multiplier_Configuration__mdt.Din_Familie_Jurist.Cost_Multiplier_Value__c*0.8 + Venue_Rental_Cost__c*0.8 + Price_Per_Cover_Excl_Vat__c *Capacity__c), 'FA_SE', ((Capacity__c*0.45)*$CustomMetadata.Currency_Multiplier_Configuration__mdt.dinfamiliejurist_nu.Cost_Multiplier_Value__c*0.8 + Venue_Rental_Cost__c*0.8 + Price_Per_Cover_Excl_Vat__c*Capacity__c), 'Testamente_DK', ((Capacity__c*0.45)*$CustomMetadata.Currency_Multiplier_Configuration__mdt.Testamente_Danmark.Cost_Multiplier_Value__c*0.8 + Venue_Rental_Cost__c*0.8 + Price_Per_Cover_Excl_Vat__c*Capacity__c), 'Testamente_SV', ((Capacity__c*0.45)*$CustomMetadata.Currency_Multiplier_Configuration__mdt.Testamente_Sverige.Cost_Multiplier_Value__c*0.8 + Venue_Rental_Cost__c*0.8 + Price_Per_Cover_Excl_Vat__c*Capacity__c) ,0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ((Avg. Lead Cost * (Capacity * 0.45)) + Venue Rental Cost + (Price Per Cover * Capacity)) * 0.8
CustomField.label: Budgeted Cost Excl. Vat
